channel.title: Kicksecure 17 has been Released! (Debian 12 bookworm based) - Major Release
channel.description:
Debian 12 bookworm based. Major release.
# Download
* https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Debian * VirtualBox: https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/VirtualBox * KVM: https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/KVM * Qubes * R4.1: Unavailable. Not planned. * R4.2: https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Qubes
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using by performing a release upgrade.
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Release_Upgrade
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Release_Upgrade_16_to_17
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Contribute
# Major Changes
* port to Debian 12 (`bookworm`) * update Tor Browser to 12.5.1 * use Tor packages from Debian stable instead of Tor Project repository * enable zsh by default for new builds (might get reverted depending on ticket https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/8343) * [replacing initramfs-tools with dracut](https://forums.whonix.org/t/replacing-initramfs-tools-with-dracut/4487)
# Changelog
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Stable_Release
# Full difference of all changes
[https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/16.0.9.8-developers-only…17.0.3.0-developers-only](https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/16.0.9.8-developers-only...17.0.3.0-developers-only)

item.title: Kicksecure 17 has been Released! (Debian 12 bookworm based) - Major Release
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Debian 12 bookworm based. Major release.

Download

  • Install Kicksecure ™ inside Debian
  • VirtualBox: Kicksecure ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox
  • KVM: Kicksecure ™ for KVM with Xfce
  • Qubes
    • R4.1: Unavailable. Not planned.
    • R4.2: Kicksecure ™ for Qubes

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using by performing a release upgrade.

Kicksecure – 5 Jul 23

Release Upgrade

What is a Release Upgrade?

Kicksecure – 5 Jul 23

Release Upgrade Kicksecure ™ 16 to Kicksecure ™ 17

How to Release Upgrade from Kicksecure ™ 16 to Kicksecure ™ 17

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!

Please Donate!

Kicksecure – 25 Mar 23

Donating to Kicksecure ™

PayPal, Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH) or Token, Credit Card, Bank Wire, Others

Please Contribute!

Kicksecure – 7 Jun 23

Contribute to Kicksecure

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Major Changes

  • port to Debian 12 (bookworm)
  • update Tor Browser to 12.5.1
  • use Tor packages from Debian stable instead of Tor Project repository
  • enable zsh by default for new builds (might get reverted depending on ticket Qubes-Whonix: enable zsh by default · Issue #8343 · QubesOS/qubes-issues · GitHub)
  • replacing initramfs-tools with dracut

Changelog

Kicksecure – 5 Jul 23

Changelog

Kicksecure ™ Release Notes, Changelog

Full difference of all changes

https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/16.0.9.8-developers-only…17.0.3.0-developers-only

Read full topic
